name: Last Seconds
description:
Last Seconds is a single-player, wave based zombie shooter; this may not sound revolutionary but that is not the point. This is my very first game so my aim was to create something that  is a simple little game which I hope many will enjoy! :) 

Any questions please leave a comment. 

I really hope you enjoy your last seconds;). 

Csabs :)

Mouse and Keyboard  Controls- 

W,A,S,D - Movement

ESC- Pause

Left Mouse- Shoot

V- Switch to Knife

1-Switch to Weapon 1

2-Switch to Weapon 2

E-Interact

U- Open Upgrade Panel

Controller Controls- 

ESC- Pause

Left Joy Stick - Movement

Right Joy Stick- Aim

Right Trigger- Shoot

Y/Triangle- Switch Weapon

A/X-Interact

Dpad Down- Open Upgrade Panel
